text:
e="preserve">Dr. Mohammad Fathy Saoud is the former President at Qatar Foundation for Education, Science and Community Development since November 2007.
He is the Vice Chairperson of the Board of Governors for the Sidra Medical and Research Center. Also, he chairs the Executive Committee of the Sidra Medical. He is a member of the Steering Committee of University of Calgary Nursing Program in Qatar and the Executive Committee of the College of North Atlantic- Qatar.
